alert.note: Alert for Interior Cumberland Highlands (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 3:36AM EDT until March 24 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...MIXED PRECIPITATION EXPECTED TODAY AND TONIGHT... .A couple of waves of low pressure will move past the region today and tonight. While low elevations will see mainly rain, elevations especially above 1000 feet will see and mixture of snow, sleet, and freezing rain. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of up to one inch, sleet accumulations of around 1/2 of an inch and ice accumulations up to a quarter inch. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and southern New Hampshire and western Maine. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..
